Producer: Cassandra Kulukundis, Ned Benson, Jessica Chastain, Todd J. Labarowski, Emanuel Michael
Production Co: Unison Films, Standard Deviations, Dreambridge Films
Synopsis: Following the death of their child, a woman (Jessica Chastain) leaves her husband (James McAvoy) and flees to the suburban home of her wealthy parents.
Title: The Disappearance of Eleanor Rigby
